text:
e="preserve">Antonella Lattanzi (born 1979 in Bari) is an Italian novelist and screenwriter. She was a finalist at the 2013 Stresa Prize. She won the 2017 Cortina d'Ampezzo Prize.
Life.
Lattanzi's work appears in "Tuttolibri de La Stampa" and "Il Venerdì de La Repubblica".
She and Filippo Gravinio wrote the screenplays of the movie "Fiore" by Claudio Giovannesi in 2013, and "2night" by Ivan Silvestrini in 2016.
